Hello

For me it would be really nice to see the functionality of antenas similiar how it is made in RemoteTech Mod. (without lag)

I spend hours building constelation of satellites around plantes, combinig different types antenas on one satellite, (direct, omnidirect) Adding more omnidirect antenas for better coverage of signal, pointing direct antenas to exact locations etc. It made a more realistic gameplay compared to stock antenas and made a purpose to build constelations of satellites that actually matters.

What do you think guys?
